text: Abdullah Majrashi (; born 24 August 1997) is a Saudi Arabian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Saudi Pro League side Al-Raed. ==Personal life== Abdullah is the Brother of the footballer Fahad Majrashi. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan=2|Club !rowspan=2|Season !colspan=2|League !colspan=2|King Cup !colspan=2|Asia !colspan=2|Other !colspan=2|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan=3 |Al-Ahli |2017–18 |8||1||3||0||3||0||colspan=2|—||14||1 |- |2018–19 |5||0||0||0||0||0||3||0||8||0 |- !Total !13!!1!!3!!0!!3!!0!!3!!0!!22!!1 |- |rowspan="1"|Ohod (loan) |2018–19 |3||0||0||0||colspan=2"|—||colspan=2"|—||3||0 |- ! colspan=2 | Career totals !16!!1!!3!!0!!3!!0!!3!!0!!25!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Al-Ahli Saudi FC players Category:Ohod Club players Category:Al-Raed FC players Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers Category:Footballers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Saudi Arabia
title: Abdullah Majrashi (footballer, born 1997)
